00113 #define Register_Class(CLASSNAME) \
00114   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {return new CLASSNAME;} \
00115   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cClassFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__));)
00116 
00123 // Implementation note: this is basically a Register_Class(), making sure the class subclasses from cModule.
00124 #define Define_Module(CLASSNAME) \
00125   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {cModule *ret = new CLASSNAME; return ret; } \
00126   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cClassFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__,"module"));)
00127 
00136 #define Define_Module_Like(CLASSNAME,NEDNAME)  NOTE_the_deprecated_Define_Module_Like_macro_has_been_removed_in_version_4_0;
00137 
00144 // Implementation note: this is basically a Register_Class().
00145 #define Define_Channel(CLASSNAME) \
00146   static cObject *__FILEUNIQUENAME__() {cChannel *ret = new CLASSNAME; return ret; } \
00147   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(classes.getInstance()->add(new cClassFactory(opp_typename(typeid(CLASSNAME)),__FILEUNIQUENAME__, "channel"));)

00196 #define __REGISTER_CONFIGOPTION(ID, ARGLIST) \
00197   cConfigOption *ID; \
00198   EXECUTE_ON_STARTUP(configOptions.getInstance()->add(ID = new cConfigOption ARGLIST);)
